abilities.name: Honeycomb Defender
abilities.effect: If Scizor has 6 or more damage counters on it, any damage done to Scizor by attacks is reduced by 40 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Accelerate
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon is Knocked Out by this attack, prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to Scizor during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Pound Down
attacks.effect: If you don't have any Pokémon with any Poké-Powers in play, this attack does 40 damage plus 30 more damage.
